org.eclipse.ditto:ConnectionStatus:1.0.0.description: Information about the status of the connectivity to a device

statusProperties.name: readySince
statusProperties.description: Timestamp when the device or the connectivity endpoint signals that the device is connected and stays connected at least for some time and is ready for receiving information

statusProperties.name: readyUntil
statusProperties.description: Timestamp until when device or the connectivity endpoint signals that it stays ready for receiving information; if it signals that it stays connected and is ready until further notice then this timestamp is symbolically set to a timestamp that is at least 1 year ahead of now
